column5: To the gentleman who asked for an introduction i am sorry. I am new to the fourm so i guess I owe one. My name is Don i am 21 years on from Niagara on the Lake On, Canada. I live 2 mintues away from the niagara river, but do not seem to do a lot of fishing there. I usually get away for 1 solid week of bass fishing (which i live for) for the summer where i head to the french river and some small lakes around there. Thats all for now.
Nice water around your area. Welcome aboard.
Welcome!  I can appreciate the fact that you look forward to fishing up north, but you have some prime fishing right in your neighbourhood for MANY species.
And a warm, well wet actually welcome from the UK as well  theres a few brits on here as well so if you need a report on any English lakes or rivers I know a man who can.
WElcome to the Jungle have fun aaaa
Howdo!  Looking forward to reports with a photo or two.  Lotsa folks to walk you through anything unfamiliar.
Welcome to the board from a fellow Niagaratarian.   Don
Tracker! You liar you!!! I saw you eat those chicken wings so dont tell us you dont eat no meat!!!  Welcome to the fun house bassmaster1144!!!
Welcome to the board Don...  Maureen
LOL Joefish - and if you were there tonight you could have seen me eat more of them - lol  Don
Welcome to the board....looking forward to your reports!
I think it's time that you take the nice walk down to the whirlpool! FYI Bring water and oranges for the trip back up
